record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3

speaking.paragraph: I understand that H.R. 3 is at the desk and ready for its second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
